title: SOLD 1888 Scrapps Rowe - 100% Proceeds to Charity
author: canjond

posts.post_title: SOLD 1888 Scrapps Rowe - 100% Proceeds to Charity

posts.post_content:
If still available, I’ll take it. 

It’s not in my collecting wheelhouse, but I love Detroit and that cause is near and dear to my heart. A great thing you’re doing. 

We can connect over email at [url]samuelswartz@yahoo.com[/url].
Thanks Sam.  I sent you a PM.  The Scrapps is yours!
